direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods process and transform ISSN-related codes but in opposite directions (ISSN to EAN-13 and EAN-13 to ISSN).
Both methods involve validation and transformation of ISSN codes with similar control flows and exception handling.
Both methods involve validation and transformation of EAN-13 codes with similar control flows and exception handling.
Both methods involve validation of ISSN codes, though convertToEAN13 performs additional transformations.

enhanced_by.reason: The validate method is used to ensure the input ISSN code is valid before conversion.
The validateEan method can be used to validate the resulting EAN-13 code after conversion.
The extractFromEAN13 method can be used to verify the correctness of the converted EAN-13 code by attempting to extract the original ISSN code.
